name: Resume
description:
I challenged myself to make a something that could replace my boring paper resume and make something interactive. After lots of planning and starting over 3 times, I finally made this game in 6 (non-continuous) days.  

So play the game to see the skills that posses!

Controls
Spacebar/Left Side Of Screen - Slash
Up Arrow/Top Left Side Of Screen - Jump
Down Arrow/Bottom Left Side Of Screen - Roll
